responsibilities: Learn to coach, manage and develop a team of 50-100 Amazon Associates
Drive standard work and continuous improvement through an intern project
Oversee truck deliveries, handle and sort packages using pallet jacks, and operate PIT equipment
Participate in physical warehouse activities including lifting, pushing, pulling, squatting, bending, reaching, and climbing stairs
personal_suitability: Strong verbal and written communication skills

notes: Not a corporate, remote, or office-based position
No visa sponsorship provided; eligible candidates must have work authorization without employer intervention
benefits: Summer relocation and housing assistance (if eligible)
Access to Amazon's Medical Advice Line
